text: Novi Pazar (, lit. "New Bazaar"; ) is a city in the Ra≈°ka District of southwestern Serbia. 66,527 lived here in 2011. The city is majority ethnic Bosniak with a Muslim majority who follow Islam. It is the only Muslim- majority city in Serbia. It is located close to the border with Kosovo and Montenegro. It is surrounded by mountains on all sides. ==References== Category:Cities in Serbia
title: Novi Pazar
